template_selection.rationale: Moat strength ≥8.0/10.0 with significant network effects (8.4/10), data advantages (8.5/10), and platform ecosystems (8.6/10)

data_sources.economic_data: FRED MCP server - Fed Funds Rate 4.33%, GDP growth positive, unemployment 4.2%
data_sources.stock_validation: NVIDIA $4.4T market cap, 80%+ training dominance validated

key_insights_extracted: Network effects strength through CUDA ecosystem (4.2M developers)
Data advantages from hyperscale platforms (Google 8.5B queries, Meta 3.9B users)
Platform ecosystem lock-in (92% developer retention, $2.8M switching costs)
Economic sensitivity to Fed rates (-0.73 correlation, currently favorable at 4.33%)
NVIDIA market dominance validated (80%+ training, $4.4T market cap)

compliance_verification.disclaimer_text: ⚠️ Not financial advice. Competitive advantages and performance vary.
